description:
The screenshots really have me interested. Looks like you put a lot of hard work into this, and I definitely want to try it.

However, the game does not install on my system (22.04). 

My guess is some updaate somewhere made this happen and it's really not your fault, but...nonetheless, this does not install.

I'll try to come back later and see if it is changed! (I will also check the website and see if there's any clue there.)
